item.title: About Me!!
item.description: THANKS WATCH THIS PAGE!! self intoroduction Hi! THIS is idichi syoya, university student. I am interested in image recognition, speech recognition, speech synthesis, and networking (general). my product was like Google Home !? I was from an industrial high school, and when I was in my second year of high school, when I said “light on”, I developed a system like “Google Home” that turns on electricity before the launch of Google Home.
